content: Our Transportation Solutions segment, which represented 40% of our revenue and 17% of our segment operating income in the quarter, remains extremely strong as we saw bid activity pickup and margins improve. We finished the current quarter with a record combined backlog of $1,900 million, a 25% increase over the end of 2021. Revenues for the current quarter were $557 million, up $93 million or 20% over the prior year quarter. The current quarter revenues were $256 million, and increase over the prior year quarter of . Transportation revenues were $221 million in the current quarter, a decrease of $28.8 million or 12% from the prior year comparable quarter. Consistent with our strategic intent low bid, heavy highway work declined by approximately $10 million in the quarter compared to the prior year. Our third quarter EBITDA totaled $60.2 million, an increase of 50% over the prior year quarter of $40 million.
